Articles.Content:
Dear Mr. Deltac

I do not own both the Steam Release and the Store Release of KSP. I own the Store Release as I like to update manually. However, I do not harbor prejudice against those who use the Steam Store, nor do I harbor prejudice against the many users of the gaseous form of Water.

Signed,

~Flymetothemun

The next person of viewership shall agree that Radio is one of the most amazing inventions that humans have ever created and that most living human beings in this digital age have become too used to Radio to be amazed at it's simplicity and complexity.

Edited November 17, 2013 by Flymetothemun

Disagree. It's wasteful, uncontrollable, and makes us a target for aliens.

The user below agrees.

Nope

The user below have read Taking The Red Pill

The user below cannot solve a rubik's cube.

My hammer says yes.

The user below me has a fish named Billy Bo Bob Wilson.

Nope

The user below hates the new YT comment thing.

Meh. It has good and bad points.

The user below me will attempt to murder me for that nonplussed, nonaggressive statement.

nope. I agree.

the user below me has AEIOU AAAAAAAAAAAAAA JHONN MADDEN JHONN MADDEN

FOOTBALL!

Nope

The user below me know Tom
false the person below me is one of the ones that help to derail one of the big three

Eyup.

The user below was also a major poster in the big three.

Not really. They tended to be rather tedious.

The user below does not remember what the big 3 were.

false one can always remember "remember remember the fifth of november, The Gunpowder treason and plot"(sorry just had to)

the user below me thinks this thread is going in to have the same fate as the big three

Edited November 18, 2013 by toolofdarkness

True. Eventually, due to Chaos theory, someone will do something to derail the thread and lock it.

The next user thinks we should stop talking about you-know-what so that said thing does not happen.

false its always right to know what will become of a thread

the user below me will try to derail the tread with ponies

Edited November 18, 2013 by toolofdarkness

(you walked right into it)

the user below me want's more ksp updates

No, why would anyone want that? How could you. [sarcasm self test complete]

The user below me wants to nuke the post above me unless it's you Brian since you're still on the forum at this moment.

false since im the one who thought of it

the user below me thinks this account and briansun1's accounts are the same person

No, your grammar is worse (No offense)

The user below me doesn't speak German.

I only had 2 years of High school German... so no, I don't.

The user below me launched a bear into space.

nope...

false every thing looks better in it see
